divs: Sighting DetailsIn the year 1957, I was 15 years old . At the night , I relaxed and to look up the star. I saw five light moving, I thought it was a military plane., but I deceided to set up a small telescope to look through, I realized was not a military plane. Because disc was full yellow that was time, my mind was not obvious,yet.Few seconds I realized clearly is a top purple dome of saucer.I amazed it. I run toward my parent's house in Prichard,Alabama near Mobile. I told them about that.They said, I must be got drunk or dream something like that. So kept me silent, not tell anyone about it since years. Now I am telling the truth.. Excuse me, I am a impaired hearing. Ok See, an old draw papers in the year 1957.
